name: Mini Caprese Bites
description: These fun bite-size snacks are a great way to use basil and tomatoes from a SNAP-Ed garden. They can also help kids learn to like veggies.

name: Pupusas Revueltas
description: This recipe is lower in saturated fat than traditional pupusas, but are still loaded with flavor! Enjoy these pupusas with curtido.

name: Chili Bean Dip
description: This dip goes great with baked  tortilla chips or raw vegetables at a party. You can experiment with the spices to get new flavors.

name: Southwestern Pepper Cups
description: Delicious stuffed peppers that will soon become a staple in your home.

name: Deviled Eggs
description: A favorite dish at parties and potlucks, Deviled Eggs also make a great, protein-filled anytime snack!

name: Fruit Salsa
description: A salsa that is different from what you may usually have, this fruit recipe can be a great way to help older kids and teens learn safe knife skills in the kitchen.

name: Broiled Tomatoes and Cheese
description: This recipe is especially tasty when using tomatoes that are fresh from the garden or Farmers Market.

name: Baked Chicken Nuggets
description: Make chicken nuggets at home using cereal crumbs, spices, and herbs. You can cook them in the microwave or the oven.

name: Tortilla Chips and Bean Dip
description: Prepare this layered dip with beans, salsa, sour cream, and cheese for your next party. Make your own tortilla chips to serve on the side. Fill up on fiber while having fun.

name: Vegetable Medley with Salsa Dip
description: Use this colorful veggie plate at your next party or gathering.

name: Flavored Water
description: Try this refreshing flavor combination of watermelon, lime, and mint, or create your own!

name: Orange Banana Frosty
description: The perfect treat to end a hot summer day.  Toss the ingredients in the blender and enjoy!

name: Fruit Slush
description: Serve this fruit slush as a drink or a dessert, and keep leftovers in the fridge for later. Pour it over fresh ice when you are ready to eat.

name: Fruit and Yogurt Breakfast Shake
description: Shake up your day with this quick and easy breakfast. Make this recipe with any of your favorite fruits, especially when they are in season!

name: Cantaloupe Cooler
description: Cool down in the heat with this fruit cooler. Refreshing orange juice mixed with sweet cantaloupe creates the perfect, easy-to-make drink! You can even get creative and use any fruit you please!

name: Fruit Juice Slush
description: Blending your favorite fruit juice concentrate with ice and water will give you a quick and refreshing drink on a warm day.

name: Lemonade
description: A fresh, single serving of lemonde that is perfect for a hot summer day. Only one lemon is needed for this recipe. Enjoy!

name: Fruit Smoothie
description: Have fun experimenting with different fruit and juices in this scrumptious smoothie.

name: Peach Cooler
description: On a hot, summer day, freeze the drained peaches (or fresh) for at least 45 minutes before preparing this sweet and tangy drink.

name: Orange Delight Juice
description: Fruity and flavorful, this delightful juice is full of fruit, honey, and cinnamon.  Enjoy!

name: Ginger Bread Mix
description: Make this mix ahead of time and use it as a base for the Ginger Orange Muffins recipe.

name: Soul-Healthy Cornbread
description: Serve this sweet cornbread with your favorite savory entrée.

name: Chapatis Flatbread
description: Just 4 ingredients is all you need to make delicious flatbread at home. Serve with dip at your next gathering or as a side to dinner.

name: Three-Grain Peanut Bread
description: Enjoy this scrumptious snack with your family. Use another nut butter if a member of your family suffers from a peanut allergy.

name: Cranberry Pumpkin Muffins
description: Enjoy these delicious muffins for breakfast anytime of the year using canned pumpkin and frozen cranberries.

name: Fabulous Fruit Muffins
description: Try these muffins for breakfast or as a snack during the day. Use fresh fruit when in season - frozen or canned fruit works too!

name: Pumpkin Bread
description: Sweet and spicy, this pumpkin bread makes a wonderful holiday treat.

name: Oat Snack Cakes
description: These oat snack cakes are full of whole grains and flavor, making them perfect for sharing with friends and family.

name: Oat Bran Muffins
description: Full of fruit and oat bran, these tasty muffins can be enjoyed as a snack or a dessert.

name: Lemon Corn Cake
description: A light and flavorful cake, packed with sweet and tangy lemon flavor!  The lemon glaze takes this cake to the next level!

name: Banana Split Oatmeal
description: Frozen yogurt and bananas turn oatmeal into a healthy dessert or satisfying snack.

name: Tropical Morning Treat
description: Enjoy this tasty fruit dish in the morning or as a snack anytime of the day.

name: Fantastic French Toast
description: Start your day with this classic breakfast recipe and serve it with fresh or canned fruit.

name: Sure to Please Baked Eggs & Cheese
description: Add your favorite veggies to dress up this cheese and egg dish, or serve with fresh salsa.

name: Rise and Shine Cobbler
description: This cobbler can be made quickly in the microwave. Enjoy this tasty treat for breakfast or as a sweet dessert.

name: Banana Pancakes with Apple Topping
description: Kick your pancakes up a notch with fresh bananas and an apple topping. The whole wheat flour and the fresh fruit in the recipe add extra fiber to your breakfast.

name: Breakfast Parfait
description: This colorful parfait features four types of fruit: fresh, frozen, canned, and dried.

name: Cranberry Pumpkin Muffins
description: Enjoy these delicious muffins for breakfast anytime of the year using canned pumpkin and frozen cranberries.

name: Fabulous Fruit Muffins
description: Try these muffins for breakfast or as a snack during the day. Use fresh fruit when in season - frozen or canned fruit works too!

name: Fruit and Yogurt Breakfast Shake
description: Shake up your day with this quick and easy breakfast. Make this recipe with any of your favorite fruits, especially when they are in season!

name: Frosted Cake
description: Vanilla and orange peel are the secret to making this delicious cake with chocolate frosting. Serve at your next special occasion for a tasty treat.

name: Fruit Sorbet
description: Try this refreshing flavor combination or create your own!

name: Summer Fruit Salad
description: Toss this fruit salad together in a flash. Doubles and triples easily for a large group.

name: Honeydew Summer Salad Wedges
description: This chilled, fruit, salad is perfect to enjoy on a hot summer day!

name: Peach Apple Crisp
description: This delicious dessert is the perfect ending to any meal. This recipe is simple to prepare and the dish is satisfying to taste.

name: Fruit Slush
description: Serve this fruit slush as a drink or a dessert, and keep leftovers in the fridge for later. Pour it over fresh ice when you are ready to eat.

name: Magical Fruit Salad
description: The whole family will love making this as much as they love eating it! Pineapple, grapes, and bananas add flavor and texture to this creamy and delicious dessert.

name: Fruit Yogurt Pops
description: These pops are a fun warm-weather treat that needs only two ingredients. With no cooking, cutting, or special equipment required, kids can learn to make these by themselves.

name: Winter Crisp
description: What is that sweet cinnamon scent, wafting from your kitchen? It's this apple and cranberry winter crisp.

name: Crustless Pumpkin Pie
description: Using Master Mix saves time and money in this pumpkin pie recipe.

name: Skillet Pasta Dinner
description: A quick and delicious one-pot meal that is sure to please the whole family. Add your favorite frozen or fresh veggies to this dish.

name: Spicy Chicken and Potato Soup
description: This rich-tasting and hearty potato soup is full of flavor and perfect for lunch or dinner.

name: Huevos Rancheros with Fresh Salsa
description: For breakfast, lunch, or dinner, this savory egg dish is fresh, healthy, and inexpensive.

name: Pasta Primavera
description: A flavorful spring recipe that you and your family will savor. Use your favorite spring vegetables from your garden or local farmers market: kohlrabi, sugar snap peas, carrots, and asparagus are all delicious options.

name: Salmon Patties
description: Tasty patties cooked in a skillet that are perfect topped with fresh lettuce, tomato, and a side of fresh or canned pineapple.

name: Herb Broiled Beef
description: Prepare this marinated beef the night before, and have dinner on the table in less than half an hour!

name: Any Days a Picnic Chicken Salad
description: Onion and pickle relish spice up a traditional chicken salad.

name: Vegetable and Turkey Stir Fry
description: Cooked turkey combined with your favorite frozen veggies means you can throw this stir fry together quickly for a healthy weekday dinner.

name: Full of Beans Hot Dish
description: Beans are unique foods that can be counted as either a vegetable or protein. Remember to sort and soak dry beans before cooking or use canned beans.

name: Fantastic French Toast
description: Start your day with this classic breakfast recipe and serve it with fresh or canned fruit.

name: Kale Salad with Yogurt Dressing
description: This recipe redefines what a kale salad can be. By massaging the kale first, you break down the fibers leaving the greens tender and delicious!

name: Summer Fruit Salad
description: Toss this fruit salad together in a flash. Doubles and triples easily for a large group.

name: Herb Potato Salad
description: Dried herbs and spices make this zesty side dish a family favorite!

name: Cabbage Salad
description: Dill, mustard, and lemon juice give this crunchy salad a zesty dressing. Make the dressing ahead to save time later.

name: Vegetable Salad
description: This tasty, marinaded veggies salad uses canned veggies and can be enjoyed at any time of the year. Use fresh vegetables if you have them on hand.

name: Confetti Grain Salad
description: Try this recipe with a variety of vegetables until you find what you and your family like best.

name: Any Days a Picnic Chicken Salad
description: Onion and pickle relish spice up a traditional chicken salad.

name: Carrot Raisin Salad
description: This easy and healthy side salad has a sweet and tangy flavor. Make it ahead of time and serve it chilled.

name: Magical Fruit Salad
description: The whole family will love making this as much as they love eating it! Pineapple, grapes, and bananas add flavor and texture to this creamy and delicious dessert.

name: Easy Fruit Salad
description: This semi-homemade recipe mixes canned fruit cocktail with fresh fruit and yogurt for a quick and tasty fruit salad.

name: Easy Marinara Sauce
description: Canned tomatoes and fresh spinach come together beautifully in this quick and tasty marinara recipe.

name: Fresh Salsa
description: Fresh tomatoes with jalapeno peppers, cilantro, onions, and lime make this dish a light and easy summer time treat. Serve it with chicken and rice for a complete meal.

name: Low Fat Ranch Dip
description: A blender transforms canned beans, herbs, and spices into this delectable ranch style dip!

name: Chili Bean Dip
description: This dip goes great with baked  tortilla chips or raw vegetables at a party. You can experiment with the spices to get new flavors.

name: Fruit Dip
description: Lime juice and orange concentrate gives this yogurt dip a tangy and sweet flavor. Serve it with your favorite fruits.

name: Brussels Sprouts with Mushroom Sauce
description: This side dish is delicious when made with brussels sprouts, and you could also make it with broccoli, cabbage, kale, collards, or turnips. Cooking time may vary for different types of vegetables.

name: Basic Soup and Sauce Mix
description: This pantry staple can be used in casseroles, soups, dips, and many more dishes!

name: Pico de Gallo
description: A fantastic recipe to try when your garden or market is overflowing with fresh, flavorful, tomatoes!

name: Confetti Bean Salsa
description: This three-ingredient salsa is colorful and delicious. Serve it with whole grain chips or crackers for dipping.

name: White Sauce - Thin
description: Add a creamy texture to your soups and stews with this easy sauce.

name: Vegetarian Collard Greens
description: Want to add more leafy greens to your diet but aren’t sure how to start? Check out this recipe for collard greens. A healthy and tasty side dish to accompany your next meal.

name: Spicy Chicken and Potato Soup
description: This rich-tasting and hearty potato soup is full of flavor and perfect for lunch or dinner.

name: Cheesy Broccoli & Rice Squares
description: This kid-friendly side dish, packed with whole grains and low-fat dairy, is perfect for busy weeknights. These squares reheat well as leftovers, an added bonus!

name: Mini Caprese Bites
description: These fun bite-size snacks are a great way to use basil and tomatoes from a SNAP-Ed garden. They can also help kids learn to like veggies.

name: Kale Salad with Yogurt Dressing
description: This recipe redefines what a kale salad can be. By massaging the kale first, you break down the fibers leaving the greens tender and delicious!

name: Italian Style Vegetables
description: Enjoy this fresh and flavorful dish during the summer when the zucchini, green beans, fresh tomatoes, and corn are all at their peak flavor and freshness. This side dish is quick and easy to prepare and delicious to enjoy!

name: Mexican Vegetables
description: Spices and red wine vinegar dress up the vegetables in this recipe. Enjoy as a side dish with your favorite entree.

name: Honeydew Summer Salad Wedges
description: This chilled, fruit, salad is perfect to enjoy on a hot summer day!

name: Cabbage Salad
description: Dill, mustard, and lemon juice give this crunchy salad a zesty dressing. Make the dressing ahead to save time later.

name: Vegetable Salad
description: This tasty, marinaded veggies salad uses canned veggies and can be enjoyed at any time of the year. Use fresh vegetables if you have them on hand.

name: Bugs on a Log
description: Kids and adults can create their own combinations of the ingredients for a fun and healthy snack activity.

name: Mini Caprese Bites
description: These fun bite-size snacks are a great way to use basil and tomatoes from a SNAP-Ed garden. They can also help kids learn to like veggies.

name: Honeydew Summer Salad Wedges
description: This chilled, fruit, salad is perfect to enjoy on a hot summer day!

name: Tropical Morning Treat
description: Enjoy this tasty fruit dish in the morning or as a snack anytime of the day.

name: Any Days a Picnic Chicken Salad
description: Onion and pickle relish spice up a traditional chicken salad.

name: Fruit Slush
description: Serve this fruit slush as a drink or a dessert, and keep leftovers in the fridge for later. Pour it over fresh ice when you are ready to eat.

name: Magical Fruit Salad
description: The whole family will love making this as much as they love eating it! Pineapple, grapes, and bananas add flavor and texture to this creamy and delicious dessert.

name: Fiesta Mix
description: Serve this mix of cereal, raisins, peanuts, and coconut at your next get-together.

name: Terrific Bean Taco
description: Quick and easy tacos, perfect for an easy weeknight meal. You can use homemade refried beans or canned refried beans for this recipe.

name: Easy Fruit Salad
description: This semi-homemade recipe mixes canned fruit cocktail with fresh fruit and yogurt for a quick and tasty fruit salad.

name: Asian Mango Chicken Wraps
description: Sweet and juicy ripe mangos are the perfect balance for the savory ingredients in this Asian wrap. Dinner's ready in 30 minutes, or make ahead for a tasty portable lunch.

name: Grape and Cashew Salad Sandwich
description: The creamy and tangy goodness of low-fat cottage cheese is the perfect balance to sweet grapes and cashews. Enjoy this salad as a sandwich filling or on a bed of lettuce.

name: Fruity Thai Pita Pockets
description: Bored with the same old sandwich at lunch? Liven up packed lunches with this Thai-influenced pita pocket: a surprising blend of fruits, spinach and peanut sauce tucked in a very portable pita pocket.

name: Shrimp Confetti Salad Sandwich with...
description: Grapes are a natural balance to this sweet and savory shrimp salad. Enjoy as a sandwich or over lettuce.

name: Mushroom Steak Fajitas
description: Bring another serving of vegetables and important nutrients to your plate with this veggie-filled twist on classic fajitas. We've upped the vegetables ante by sautéing savory mushrooms and mixing them with steak for an umami-rich, flavorful punch. And we've sped up the preparation time for this Tex-Mex favorite, foregoing marinating the steak by using a tender cut.

name: Tuna Apple Salad Sandwich
description: Liven up your lunch-time sandwich with a refreshing mix of tuna, apples, raisins, and walnuts.

name: Turkey and Cucumber Sandwich
description: These sandwiches, flavored with herbs and spices, are sure to hit the spot. With whole grains, lean protein, and dairy, this well-rounded, MyPlate meal will keep you satisfied all afternoon.

name: Peanut, Peach, N Pineapple Wrap
description: Inspired by an all-time favorite, peanut butter and jelly sandwiches, this wrap is easy and fun for kids to make. With the sweet flavor of fruit and the crisp texture of green pepper and lettuce, it's a great way to fit one cup of fruit and veggies into a "wrap 'n go" meal.

name: Tuna Slider with Green Chiles
description: For a touch of spice and everything nice, add some canned green chilies to tuna sliders. You won't believe how much flavor this canned staple packs in! With a well-stocked pantry full of canned ingredients, like tuna and green chilies, it’s easy to create delicious, homemade meals you can feel good about serving your family and friends.

name: Curried Chickpea Salad
description: This dish can be served on whole wheat bread, on a bed of lettuce, or as a dip with your favorite veggies!
